response.overview: This story is about Sarla Bhatia, my grandmother who came from Peshawar,  Pakistan (North-West Frontier Province). It follows her events coming to India. The movie  depicts the psychological impact faced when the country is torn apart and how these wounds  deepen if not healed. During her final years she had Alzheimer's. The disease took her sanity  away, but it also gave her a chance to meet her father and visit her childhood home for one last  time.
response.title: stains
